name: Viscacha rat
description:
Viscacha rats are a group of rodents in the family Octodontidae. All species are found in Argentina. They are placed in the following genera:Genus Octomys
O. mimax , mountain viscacha rat, found in the Andes
Genus Pipanacoctomys
P. aureus, the golden viscacha rat, found near a salt flat
Genus Tympanoctomys, found in desert shrubland near salt flats
T. barrerae, the plains viscacha rat
T. kirchnerorum, Kirchner's viscacha rat,
T. loschalchalerosorum, the Chalchalero viscacha rat
â€ T. cordubensis
